 2012-08582012-06-19TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, VI and VII)
PrecisRegulation Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, VI and VII) in order to introduce requirements for the installation of TERRAIN AWARENESS WARNING SYSTEMS equipped with an ENHANCED ALTITUDE ACCURACY function in certain private turbine-powered aeroplanes and certain commercial aeroplanes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0136 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
